    • getLoan

      @GetMapping({"/{id}","/{id}/"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<LoanDto> getLoan(@PathVariable int id)
      Get a loan by its Id
      Parameters:
      id - the int id of the loan
      Returns:
      a response entity with the LoanDto and the Http status

    • createLoan

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<LoanDto> createLoan(@RequestBody LoanDto request)
      Create a new loan based on an input request
      Parameters:
      request - LoanDto, the LoanDto containg the Username of the visitor and the Id of the artefact that is part of the Loan request.
      Returns:
      the created LoanDto in a response entity, with an Http status

    • updateLoanStatus

      @PutMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<LoanDto> updateLoanStatus(@RequestBody LoanDto request)
      Update a loan's status to Approved or Declined
      Parameters:
      request - a LoanDto containing the loan id and status to update to
      Returns:
      an updated LoanDto in a ResponseEntity, with an Http Status

    • deleteLoan

      @DeleteMapping({"/{id}","/{id}/"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteLoan(@PathVariable int id)
      Delete a loan given its id
      Parameters:
      id - the int id of the loan
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity with a string message saying the loan was deleted, and an Http status

    • getAllLoansWithStatus

      @GetMapping({"/status","/status/"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ArrayList<LoanDto>> getAllLoansWithStatus(@RequestParam Exchange.ExchangeStatus status)
      Gets all the loans in the system with a given status
      Parameters:
      status - an ExchangeStatus ( Approved, Pending or Declined )
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with an ArrayList of type LoanDto and an Http status
